decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The parking, loading and turning spaces shown on the deposited plan no, JNU9188-06 Rev D shall be constructed to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority before the buildings hereby approved are occupied and such spaces respectively shall not be used for any other purpose.

Condition : 2 - The sight lines shown on submitted drawing no. 2499/015a shall be provided prior to the occupation of the buildings to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority and shall be subsequently maintained to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority with no obstruction to view within the vision splays above the height of 1 metre above ground level.

Condition : 4 - The industrial development hereby permitted for units 8 and 9 on drawing No. 2488/21 shall be used only for light industrial purposes within the meaning of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1972.
Condition : 5 - No industrial process shall be carried out other than within the buildings hereby approved.
description: Variation of condition 2 (parking, loading and turning spaces) to allow changes to the wording of the condition of planning permission 00315/C/P12 approved 16/10/1979 for the demolition of existing buildings and erection of warehouse and Industrial Units with ancillary offices and parking facilities.
